Purpose: Detection and isolation of Escherichia coli O157:H7 in fecal specimens for patient management and epidemiological surveillance.
Equipment: Incubators (35°C and 42°C), Sorbitol-MacConkey Agar (SMAC) or CT-SMAC plates, EMB agar, biochemical identification system (e.g., API 20E or Vitek), latex agglutination kit for O157 antigen, sterile inoculating loops and swabs
